title: The Complete Poetic Works Of Michael Madsen: 1995-2005
description: Actor, Poet and Photographer Michael Madsen (Reservoir Dogs, Kill Bill Vol I & II, ESPN's Tilt) releases the only authorized, 10 year Anniversary Edition of his poetry. This book is six-books-in-one that celebrates a decade of Madsen's poetic sketches on the road, on the movie sets and at home. He has been compared to Kerouac and even Charles Bukowski. The book is also loaded with rare photos from Madsen's professional and personal life.
author: Michael Madsen
